name: handy-work
description: Web Worker enabled hand-pose tracking for WebXR.

scripts.docs: npm run docs1 && npm run docs2 && npm run docs3;
scripts.build: rollup -c && rollup -c ./rollup-aframe.config.js && rollup -c ./rollup-standalone.config.js && rollup -f cjs ./build/esm/handy-work.standalone.js -o ./build/cjs/handy-work.standalone.js && rollup -c -p rollup-plugin-terser && find build -maxdepth 2 -iname "*.js" -not -type d -exec du -h {} \;;npm run docs
